lines.text:
[holding a Barbie-type doll]
Racine, this will not be the new Taryn Blake doll. It's eyes are brown!
I guess they couldn't get that bloodshot color just right.
Everyone... meet Jonathan Westland. Then run like hell.

[learning they've failed to land a female client]
Sandy, have you been lying down on the job... or perhaps not lying down enough?
Racine's been in more beds than a hotel breakfast tray...
Sandy, what the hell are SATs?
I think it's a test you have to take to get into college.
College? Laurie Caswell won't have time for college. She'll be too busy making money for me. Maybe when she's thirty...
Darling, did you see what she had on? You know, I heard they're doing experiments to prove that polyester causes cancer in rats.
Racine, of all the people in Manhattan you're just as nasty as I am. We should have lunch more often...
Those famous Harper family dinners. Forks on the left, knives in the back.
Darling, a little word of advice for the future... when a lady has a hot tub in her bedroom, it is NOT Mother Teresa's apartment.
The only way you get fed in this town is if you never look hungry.
I think the only time I've ever seen you well-dressed was when you were naked.
Yeah, you think about that a lot?
Not really. One screening of your porno movie gave me the general idea.
